title: Just downloaded LoL and cant play (winz 10)
body: hello can I please get some help?? just downloaded Lol and when I press the launch button it loads up a black screen but the music for the game keeps playing? any suggestions?

replies.body: Since you can hear the music playing in the background, we know that the client itself is working. What's happening with the black screen sounds like your network is having a hard time grabbing the data it needs to display from our servers. Let's make sure that there isn't anything blocking your connection with this [**guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit us back up if you're still having any issues with the client loading.
